ca.mcgill.ecse211.mountev3rest.sensor

Class UltrasonicPoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.mountev3rest.sensor.UltrasonicPoller

  • public class UltrasonicPoller
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides an interface to obtain distance measurements from the ultrasonic sensor in centimeters.

    The UltrasonicPoller class is implemented as a singleton to facilitate access to the sensor to different parts of the code.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Creates an UltrasonicPoller instance if the class has not been instantiated, otherwise returns the existing instance.
      int poll()
      Gets an updated reading of the ultrasonic sensor in centimeters.
      int pollMean()
      Gets an updated mean of the most recent ultrasonic sensor readings in centimeters.

    • Method Detail

      • getUltrasonicPoller

        public static UltrasonicPoller getUltrasonicPoller(EV3UltrasonicSensor usSensor)
        Creates an UltrasonicPoller instance if the class has not been instantiated, otherwise returns the existing instance. This method is the factory method for the singleton LightPoller class.
        Parameters:
        usSensor - Ultrasonic sensor that will be used for polling.
        Returns:
        New or existing instance of the UltrasonicPoller object.

      • getUltrasonicPoller

        public static UltrasonicPoller getUltrasonicPoller()
                                            throws PollerException
        Factory method for existing instance of the singleton UltrasonicPoller class.
        Returns:
        Existing UltrasonicPoller object.
        Throws:
        PollerException - If the UltrasonicPoller class has not been instantiated.

      • poll

        public int poll()
        Gets an updated reading of the ultrasonic sensor in centimeters.
        Returns:
        Updated raw reading in centimeters.

      • pollMean

        public int pollMean()
        Gets an updated mean of the most recent ultrasonic sensor readings in centimeters.
        Returns:
        Updated mean reading in centimeters.
